steps.text: Hello, may I speak with (list name)?

instructions.condition: If list name not available after 5 attempts
instructions.action: Is there a better day for me to call list name back? Schedule callback, and go to Closing I.

instructions.condition: Record 3rd party refusal if list name is hospitalized, in jail, is on extended vacation/travel, or is a juvenile.

steps.text: Hello, my name is (TSR name). I'm calling on behalf of Philip Morris. You currently receive coupons and other promotional offers. Do you wish to remain on our mailing list?

responses.condition: If says, 'I do not smoke.' or 'I quit.'
responses.action: If says, 'I do not smoke a Philip Morris brand.' The Philip Morris maintains a list of adult smokers regardless of brand. Would you like to remain on that list?

responses.condition: If says, 'Why haven't I ever received coupons?'
responses.action: Philip Morris sends promotional offers and coupons to selected individuals on the mailing list.

responses.condition: If says, 'How did you get my name?'
responses.action: I'm sorry, I was not provided with that information. Continue with script.

responses.condition: If says, 'Please don't call me again.'
responses.action: I'll make a note to remove your name from our list. I'm sorry to have inconvenienced you. Code as Do Not Call, and go to Closing I.
Code as Remove Name, and go to Closing I.
Code as Under 21 and go to Closing I.
Confirm spelling of all information including phone number 2061708849.

steps.text: I have just a few questions about your smoking preferences, do you have a few minutes?
